remarks: Version of ~ consensus expressed using the conditional operator.  (Remark: it may be better to express it as ~ consensus , using only binary connectives, and hinting at the fact that it is a Boolean algebra identity, like the absorption identities.)  (Contributed by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.)
statement: bj-consensus $p |- ( ( if- ( ph , ps , ch ) \/ ( ps /\ ch ) ) <-> if- ( ph , ps , ch ) ) $.
